group_1.textRight: Thanks for today!@[chara:303101:motion_100:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]I had an awesome time!

group_1.textLeft: I should be the one thanking you.@It was lots of fun.
I felt like you were strong-arming me@a little at first, but I'm glad you did.
It's the first time, in a very long time,@I have had fun like this.

group_1.textRight: You have to have a fun day out now and@again so that the stress doesn't pile up!
We do have our Magical Girl duties, but...
Even us Magical Girls aren't alone.@We have each other.
...That's right!@[chara:303101:motion_201]Can I get your e-mail address?
Thanks!@I'll let ya know next time I have a mixer!

group_1.textLeft: A mixer...for single people?!@[chara:200501:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_040.exp.json]I'm not sure I'm interested in that.

group_1.textRight: Send me a text next time you're in Kamihama?@We can go somewhere fun again!

group_1.textLeft: I will definitely let you know.
See you.@I really had a lovely time today.

group_1.textRight: Tell me if you get a boyfriend, all right?@[chara:303101:motion_100:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]We can double date!
That's your homework assignment!@[chara:303101:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]Get yourself a man!
I'm expecting you to do it, anyway!@[chara:303101:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]Okay, bye for realsies!

group_1.textLeft: We will meet again, for sure.
